title: Updated Second Floor 2 bedroom Apartment
posting_body: Welcome to The Edge at Farmington Hills in Farmington Hills, Michigan, offering 2 bedroom 2 bath apartments and townhomes in a range of styles and sizes.
Each home includes full-sized washer and dryer, patio or balcony, and updated interiors.
Our 2 bedroom homes also include central heat and air conditioning, fully equipped kitchens, and large spacious bedrooms.
Our pet-friendly gated community is situated in a peaceful neighborhood setting and residents have access to a resort-class clubhouse with outdoor pool, fitness center, carports, and green space.
We also have a great location just a minute to the I-696 highway, M-10 (Northwestern Highway), Telegraph Rd, Orchase Lake Rd, and nearby major retail stores and restaurants.
Call us today to schedule a tour to see your future home!
